item.title: 动态规划
item.description: 简单题 509. 斐波那契数/剑指Offer10-I. 斐波那契数列 没有用数列存储, 因为转台转移过程只与前两个值有关. class Solution { public int fib(int n) { if (n == 0) return 0; if (n == 1 || n == 2) return 1; int pre1 = 1, pre2 = 1, sum = 2; for (int i = 3; i <= n; i++) { sum = (pre1 + pre2) % 1000000007;//剑指的题要取余 pre1 = pre2; pre2 = sum; } return sum; } } 322. 零钱兑换 class
